title: Evaluate if Progressives lost momentum in 1920s

content.question:
Historians have argued that Progressive reform lost momentum in the 1920s. Evaluate this statement with respect to TWO of the following.

Regulation of business
Labor
Immigrants

frqParts.text:
Historians have argued that Progressive reform lost momentum in the 1920s. Evaluate this statement with respect to TWO of the following.

Regulation of business
Labor
Immigrants

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
